Activity: Check emails and catch up on industry news related to data analytics and healthcare.
Finalize the communication plan and training materials for hospital staff. Ensure the materials are clear, concise, and easy to understand.
Meet with @trainer-1 to discuss the implementation of the training program for hospital staff. Coordinate logistics, scheduling, and resource allocation.
Monitor the initial data quality metrics using the newly created dashboard. Identify any areas where data quality is particularly low or where improvement targets are not being met.
Lunch break. Relax and recharge for the afternoon.
Analyze the data to identify the root causes of any data quality issues. Investigate potential sources of error, such as data entry mistakes or system integration problems.
Develop recommendations for addressing the identified data quality issues. Propose specific actions that can be taken to improve data accuracy and completeness.
Document the findings of the data quality analysis and the proposed recommendations in a formal report. Share the report with relevant stakeholders, including @itpm-1, @ehrdev-1, and @helpdesk-1.
Review the week's accomplishments and plan for the next week. Prioritize tasks and set goals for continued data quality improvement.
